issue.title: [Python] Store sequences of arbitrary ndarrays (with same type) in Tensor value type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5819](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5819). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This can be implemented using extension types, based on outcome of ARROW-1614
